headline: The Uncertainty-Fueled Market Correction
summary: Companies, investors, and countries are all having a hard time knowing what the future holds. And that makes forecasting hard.

headline: Adobe and Microsoft Empower Marketers with AI Agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot
summary: LAS VEGAS, March 18, 2025--Today at Adobe Summit – the flagship digital experience conference – Adobe (Nasdaq:ADBE) announced the private preview of Adobe Marketing Agent, as well as continued agentic innovation within Microsoft 365 Copilot with Adobe Express Agent. This builds on a collaboration between Adobe and Microsoft to bring the power of generative AI into the flow of work—extending now to AI agents.
